doc.title: The Spy/Fancy Dress
doc.plot: Video no.16 in Silly Films collection, Molly plays a spy looking through Smiley's office. Smiley surprises her and a sword fight ensues. Smiley uses his sword to rip off Molly's clothes. This scene has two endings - one with Molly getting the upper hand and the second with some wig play. The second scene features Molly in fancy dress teasing the audience with a pie. She pies herself and is then pied by Smiley.
